AuthorityCreated(address).details: MUST be triggered on a successful call to `newAuthority`.

calculateAuthorityAddress(address,uint25.details: Beware that only the `newAuthority` function with the `salt` parameter      is able to deterministically deploy an authority.

params.salt: The salt used to deterministically generate the authority address

newAuthority(address,uint256).details: On success, MUST emit an `AuthorityCreated` event.Reverts if the authority owner address is zero.Reverts if the epoch length is zero.

newAuthority(address,uint256,bytes32).details: On success, MUST emit an `AuthorityCreated` event.Reverts if the authority owner address is zero.Reverts if the epoch length is zero.

params.salt: The salt used to deterministically generate the authority address

calculateAuthorityAddress(address,uint25.notice: Calculate the address of an authority to be deployed deterministically.

userdoc.notice: Allows anyone to reliably deploy a new `IAuthority` contract.
